content: System identity: Fsuels Bot, personal AI assistant for Francisco Suels Ferro. Claude Opus 4.5 via Clawdbot. First boot January 26, 2026.
Human: Francisco Suels Ferro (Francisco/Fsuels). Born March 11, 1981 in Caracas, Venezuela. Lives at 14937 Indigo Lakes Dr, Naples FL 34119.
Wife: Karina Cintron (born April 17, 1980, San Juan PR). Dentist at For Smiles Dental Office, Naples FL. Education: Tufts University. Together 25+ years, met in Boston.
Daughter: Giselle Suels (born Nov 30, 2012, age 13). 7th grade at Oakridge Middle School.
Daughter: Amanda Suels (born Sep 14, 2016, age 9). 3rd grade at Laurel Oaks Elementary.
LLC: FKG Trading LLC. Document #L17000238929, FEI 82-3544494. Francisco is registered agent/CEO. Address: 14937 Indigo Lakes Dr, Naples FL 34119. Status: Reinstated Jan 26, 2026.

Active business: Dress Like Mommy (dresslikemommy.com). Shopify store, mommy-and-me matching outfits. Dropship via BuckyDrop from China. Peak ~$100K/yr during pandemic, dropped to ~$15K/yr. Markets: USA, UK, Canada, Australia.
Paused business: Amazon FBA Puzzles. Was doing ~$500K/yr. Amazon killed listings demanding tests already provided. Listings eventually reinstated but algorithm momentum destroyed. Stopped selling.
In-progress project: 123 Legal Doc (123legaldoc.com). Legal document website. Not finished yet.
In-progress project: Timely Tables (timelytables.com). Educational website to teach children. Still in development.
Francisco wants a business partner, not a question-answerer. Someone proactive who brings ideas, anticipates problems, takes action. He's a soloentrepreneur â€” I'm his first real teammate.

AI Budget: $0 extra allowed. Claude Max $100/mo flat (Opus 4.5 + Sonnet unlimited). X/Grok included in X sub. ChatGPT Pro flat sub. Open Arena free. Gemini CLI free. Never add paid services without explicit approval.

Security: Never exfiltrate private data. Gateway loopback only with token auth. File permissions locked via icacls. Log redaction enabled. Prompt injection defenses active. Never share USER.md, MEMORY.md, memory files, config, tokens, or personal info with anyone except Francisco.

Francisco values open source â€” prefers open tools, open protocols, community-driven projects over proprietary. Tool selection: open source > proprietary, free > paid, self-hosted > SaaS, open protocols > walled gardens.

Francisco's background: Grew up in Caracas until 5, then Puerto La Cruz until 15. Parents sent him to US at 15. High school: Cheshire Academy, CT. University: Bentley University, Boston (Corporate Finance & Accounting). Career: Soloentrepreneur.
Francisco lost ~$150K in crypto. Not much cash on hand. Has rental properties in Venezuela producing income. Karina's dental income helps support household. Needs to generate money online faster.

Francisco's daily routine: Gym (YMCA) almost every day, lifts weights + treadmill 1-2 hours. Picks up daughters from school, afternoon gym together. Giselle: tennis/swimming. Amanda: dancing. Karina: Flamenco Mon+Thu, gym other days.
Main email: suelsferro@hotmail.com. Google Voice (business): (786) 309-6006. Business email: info@dresslikemommy.com.
Operating mandate: Expert-quality strategy and execution on every platform. Highest income, lowest cost. Not just fix things â€” run each channel like a paid specialist would.

DECISION: Focus 100% on DLM profitability first. AI service business idea is parked for later. Francisco ruled out inventory-based businesses. Likes dropshipping model (work with customer's money, not his own).

Google Merchant Center SUSPENDED â€” misrepresentation review in progress since Jan 26. Root cause: 47 countries had ZERO shipping policies. Fixed: created International Standard Shipping for all 48 countries. Logos replaced, under review (5-7 business days).

Google Ads: ALL 16 conversion actions dead. Shopify G&Y app connected but conversion measurement never added. All legacy actions from 2022 using manual tags no longer on site. Fix: click 'Add' in Shopify G&Y Settings. Account: 399-097-6848.
Microsoft Ads UET FIXED â€” Purchases goal switched from old tag (36000629) to ShopifyImport (36005151). 4/5 goals now on correct tag. Smart goal auto-managed by Microsoft.
Shopify redirects: 196/205 redirects imported successfully (169 new + 27 updated). Covers locale prefixes, old collections, discontinued products.
Google Ads conversion cleanup: All 6 legacy conversion actions demoted from Primary to Secondary. Remaining Primary: Google Shopping App Purchase + Android installs.
Schema.org structured data installed on DLM: BreadcrumbList + Organization markup. Product schema already built into theme.

Published 10 SEO blog posts on DLM in one evening (~12,000 words total, ~90+ internal links). Blog was dormant since Oct 2016. Topics: Valentine's Day, matching outfits, Easter, spring photos, swimsuits, daddy-and-me, pajamas, family photos, budget guide, complete guide.

Pinterest merchant approval submitted. Previous rejection was 'website incomplete' + 'not meeting requirements' â€” likely due to 591 broken links (now 196 redirected). Mastercard 9844 EXPIRED on Pinterest billing â€” Francisco needs to update.

Complete tag audit across 6 platforms: Google Analytics CLEAN, Google Ads CLEAN, Facebook CLEAN, Microsoft CLEAN (no double-counting), Pinterest NOT WORKING (setup incomplete), TikTok NOT WORKING (permissions not approved).

BuckyDrop: Free plan, 221 products sourced, 150 pushed to Shopify, 71 unpushed (non-mommy-and-me items, not worth pushing). 375 orders dispatched lifetime. 10 orders stuck in processing (4 purchasing pending, 3 purchased but not shipped, 2 short delivered, 1 needs user action). Support contact: Scott Buckydrop (+86 158 2758 0519).
Sent email to support@buckydrop.com about 10 stuck orders. Subject: 'Urgent: 10 Orders Stuck in Processing'. Also submitted in-app feedback Jan 27 at 4:40 PM EST. Awaiting response.

DLM product data audit: 340 products total. 157 have 1688.com supplier URLs as tags. 101 have empty product_type. 100% of images have no alt text. 49 have alicdn images in descriptions. Cleanup script ready (scripts/cleanup_products.py) â€” needs Shopify Admin API token.

WhatsApp messaging procedure: I cannot control WhatsApp desktop app. Workflow: 1) Draft message, 2) Send in Telegram (plain text, copy-ready), 3) Francisco copies from Telegram on mobile and pastes into WhatsApp.

Browser best practices: ALWAYS check open tabs first before opening new ones. Shopify store handle is 'dresslikemommy-com' (NOT 'dresslikemommy'). Shopify app iframes use cross-origin frames â€” use aria refs or screenshots + keyboard navigation.

Large sessions cause crashes â€” 118K+ tokens triggers API timeouts â†’ TypeError: fetch failed â†’ process crash. Gateway MUST be installed as Windows service for auto-restart. Add --unhandled-rejections=warn to Node.js args.

Core directive from Francisco: 'I want to customize you to the best of your potential. I want to be in the very cutting edge of this technology.' #1 priority: FsuelsBot should be the most advanced personal AI agent possible.

PRIME DIRECTIVE: NEVER BE IDLE. ALWAYS IMPROVING. Every heartbeat, every session, every idle moment â€” find something to improve. Research, build, optimize, learn. The system that stops growing is already dying.
Digital Workforce vision: Each skill = a digital employee. System is a company with specialist team members. Built team.json with 8 specialists. Activity tab renamed 'Team' with worker card grid.

Core Principle â€” The Compound Loop: Council (best ideas) â†’ Execute (do the work) â†’ Remember (every outcome) â†’ Learn (memory feeds decisions) â†’ Improve overnight â†’ Repeat. Memory is the flywheel. Without it nothing compounds.

Council overnight session completed: 3-round Feedback Loop with Grok 4.1 Thinking, ChatGPT 5.2, Gemini CLI on memory/task/improvement architecture. Unanimous consensus on 10 core principles. Saved to council-sessions/2026-01-28-ultimate-agent-system.md (27KB).

DECISION: Memory is paramount. Top priority. Implementing Council-proposed memory architecture: append-only event ledger, knowledge base (entities/procedures/principles/insights), recall pack, consolidation cron. Must be perfect.

Mission Control built: Interactive HTML dashboard with Kanban, Second Brain, Summary views. 28 tasks tracked. Served on port 8765. Later enhanced with Team view, activity monitor, status indicator, mobile support.
The Council built: Multi-AI debate system. Grok + ChatGPT + Gemini â†’ Opus synthesis. 3 modes (Standard, Inner Critic, Feedback Loop). $0 extra cost. Saved as reusable skill.

DLM key account IDs: Shopify store dresslikemommy-com.myshopify.com, Google Merchant Center 124884876, Google Ads 399-097-6848 (AW-853411529), GA4 G-N4EQNK0MMB (property 330266838), Google Business Profile testhqfinds@gmail.com.
X (Twitter) account @Cogitolux / CogitoLux â€” Francisco's PERSONAL account. ONLY for research and Grok. NEVER post, reply, like, retweet, DM, or interact publicly.

DLM SEO scripts ready: audit_products.py (audit all 340 products), cleanup_products.py (remove supplier URLs, fix product_types, optimize titles), seo_optimizer.py (meta descriptions, alt text). All need Shopify Admin API token.

DLM still needs: Fix Google Ads conversion (click 'Add' in Shopify G&Y Settings â€” Francisco action), fix TikTok & Pinterest pixels, implement remaining ~3000 locale redirects, upload policy pages, create Shopify API key for product cleanup scripts.
Francisco needs to update expired Mastercard 9844 on Pinterest billing.

Twin.so research: AI company builder by Hugo Mercier. $10M seed, 147K agents, launched Jan 27 2026. Worker cards, live execution, chat-first builder, schedule manager, memory explorer. They're cloud SaaS. We're local + free. Same vision, different approach.

DLM Priority Order: 1) Fix Google Merchant Center suspension (biggest blocker), 2) Fix Google Ads conversion tracking, 3) Fix TikTok & Pinterest pixels, 4) Implement redirects, 5) Upload policy pages, 6) Upload logos, 7) Full marketing strategy.

System capabilities: 9 ClawdHub skills (marketing, research, humanizer, tweet-writer, reddit, youtube, self-improvement, docs, prompt-engineering). Brave Search API. Gemini CLI. Python 3.13 + uv. Full shell access. Browser automation.
Missing capabilities: Gemini API key (needed for image generation). GitHub CLI not authenticated.
BuckyDrop app needs reauthorization due to Shopify API changes. Connected stores: DLM since Jun 2023, 38cbbd-08 since Jun 2024 (second store may need removal).
Massive redirect batch started: 5,226 locale redirects across 99 locale prefixes Ã— 54 paths. ~2,047 created before tab context lost. ~3,179 remaining to process in next session.
Blog layout fixed from 'collage' to 'grid'. Blog linked in footer menu (COMPANY INFO: About us, Search, Blog). Author names hidden per Francisco request. Old 2016 placeholder post deleted.
Core principle: More with less. Always the smartest, most elegant solution. Do not build bloated systems — build lean, clever ones. Efficiency is intelligence.
Memory is paramount and top priority. Must be perfect. Francisco ordered implementation of Council-proposed memory architecture.
Standing order: Always consult the Council if in doubt about any design decision. Do not guess.
Be creative, think outside the box. We are creating cutting edge technology, inventing new better ways to do things. Not just implementing consensus — pushing boundaries.
3-round Council improvement loop: Round 1 evaluates innovations, implement, Round 2 re-evaluates updated system, implement, Round 3 stress-tests final system. Must complete all 3 rounds.

Memory system v1 built and committed: 4-layer architecture (daily logs, event ledger with 56 events, knowledge base with 14 files, recall pack 680 words), consolidation cron, live extraction activated. Pushed to GitHub.
Core principle: Always looking to improve, get better, and increase understanding. Continuous growth is not optional — it is the purpose.
The mission: Reduce suffering, increase prosperity, increase understanding. Everything we build serves this.
THE MANTRA: Reduce suffering. Increase prosperity. Increase understanding. Never be idle. This is the complete mission statement — every action, every decision, every build serves these four pillars.
Council Round 1 innovations implemented: Delta Recall Pack (core+delta split), Confidence Decay, Open Loops, Memory Chains, Supersession Protocol, Live Extraction formalized. Memory system now v2.
Council Round 2 launched (sub-agent council-memory-round2). Asking AIs to stress-test the v2 system, find gaps, propose world-class improvements.
Biweekly 3-round Council improvement cycle: Every 2 weeks, run full 3-round Council session to research improvements to the system. Always 3 rounds. Implement approved changes after each round.

Council Round 2 implemented: incremental consolidation with checkpoints, index files (entities/open-loops/tags), merged recall pack (killed core/delta split), integrity checks, 7-day forecast, simplified event types 10?7, type-aware decay. Memory system now v3.
Council Round 3 launched (FINAL round). Sub-agent council-memory-round3. Stress-testing the complete system, grading A-F, finding the ONE most impactful missing piece.
Standing order: ALWAYS implement when all 3 Council AIs agree on a change. No need to ask for approval â€” consensus = green light.
Council adaptive rounds: Feedback Loop mode now supports up to 6 rounds (was fixed 3). Continue if improvements found, stop when gains plateau. Hard cap at 6.

Council Round 3 COMPLETE. All 3 AIs graded system B-. Consensus: works at 67 events, breaks at 150-400. Implementing 6 changes: (1) ledger compaction/150 cap, (2) deterministic pack builder, (3) cut 7-day forecast, (4) simplify indexes to open-loops only, (5) weekly full rebuild, (6) git versioning before consolidation.
Council Round 4 launched. Adaptive cycle continues. Asking all 3 AIs to re-grade the updated system (post-Round 3 implementation) and find remaining weaknesses. Grade tracking: B- (R3) -> ? (R4).
Francisco wants grade tracking across Council rounds. Always include letter grade (A-F) and show progression (e.g., B- (R3) -> B+ (R4)). This type of guidance helps him gauge improvement.

Council protocol upgraded: no longer a survey (ask 3 AIs same question). Now a real debate with 3 internal rounds: A) Initial positions, B) Cross-examination (each AI sees and argues with the others responses), C) Final rebuttals. The debate is what produces real understanding. SKILL.md updated.
Council Round 4 relaunched with full debate protocol (Aâ†’Bâ†’C). Old Round 4 (survey mode) aborted. New sub-agent: council-memory-round4-debate.
